title: Learn Crypto
author: Learn Crypto
content: Bitcoin is one of the most popular and in-demand coins in the cryptocurrency market. Many are investing on this Bitcoin and even many are investing. When Bitcoin was created, the price of this coin was very low and gradually as time passed, the demand and price of this coin increased. I wish that I invest bitcoins but unfortunately I don't have any bitcoins and don't know how to acquire it. Is investing in Bitcoin easy or complicated? Is it possible to achieve success by investing in Bitcoin? The main thing is how one can earn if he invests in Bitcoin and if he stays for a long time.

The main thing is how one can earn if he invests in Bitcoin and if he stays for a long time.*Investing in Bitcoin is very easy mate, all that matters is how you are able to secure your funds. *You can acquire Bitcoin using exchanges that supports p2p like binance or kucoin. * you can earn from bitcoin by hodling for a long period of time. Just as most people now are waiting for the next bull run to occur, and during this period the price of Bitcoin hits it's all time time, making them profits from the original capital they invested. Some people also go for trading, but It not usually advisable for newbies as trading comes with risk and if one is not experienced you end up loosing your funds. If you want to go into trading, you've got to read and understand how it all works.

comments.body: Quote from: Learn Crypto on October 20, 2023, 12:30:21 PMWhen Bitcoin was created, the price of this coin was very low and gradually as time passed, the demand and price of this coin increased. I wish that I invest bitcoins but unfortunately I don't have any bitcoins and don't know how to acquire it.There’s always a perfect price entry in regards with Bitcoin investment because Bitcoin usually have a major pullback on price after hitting the peak price so you can still invest on a very fair price even if you are just new on Bitcoin. The 67K price peak is your ceiling price which means anything below it is a steal because Bitcoin price always beat the ATH during bullrun. You should focus on accumulating and increasing your Bitcoin quantity instead of looking the price in fiat.You can acquire it through mining or buying it on exchange using fiat. I believe buying it is your best choice since you can instantly hold Bitcoin and be one of Bitcoin holders by using your fiat money that is infested by inflation.Quote from: Learn Crypto on October 20, 2023, 12:30:21 PM Is investing in Bitcoin easy or complicated? Is it possible to achieve success by investing in Bitcoin? The main thing is how one can earn if he invests in Bitcoin and if he stays for a long time.Bitcoin investment is very easy and straightforward. Just buy and hold! Many of us here become very successful by just believing on Bitcoin earlier and hold onto it until the ATH. You can earn on Bitcoin by buying low and selling high.

Investing in bitcoin is not a big deal what matters here is making that investment secures, directly pointing to securing your funds in a good wallet (Self Custodial).You are new here most welcome, please try to focus on reading and learning about Bitcoin & wallets it will take time you can go through the video tutorials or you can directly read the already created topics, and discussion. To buy Bitcoin you need to choose between the centralized platform or P2P trade, where you can easily buy the Bitcoin after that your primary motive should be to secure that investment.You can be successful in the Bitcoin journey, all you need is consistency and patience and keep learning with any medium about Bitcoin and crypto market, Keep in mind Bitcoin is not a fortnight rich investment approach, In risk market investment Bitcoin is an undervalued growing asset class. You can make good returns on your investment on the end if you stay consistent and connected with eh amrket.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: I guess the right question should be, HowHow much time are you willing to wait, and how much of your money are you also willing to risk? What kind of decision-maker are you? Can you be able to overcome all sorts of bearish news and wait for the right time? If you can invest a significant amount of money in bitcoin at the right time and are also willing to hold those bitcoins for a long period of time, then your reward and profit will be based on how much time you hold them and how much the price will be when you are willing to sell them multiplied by the amount that you have invested. So how much you can make is based on the time you are willing to hold them and how much you have also invested in them.

comments.body: Profit depends on how much and when you make your purchase, . comments.author: AicecreaME
comments.body: The profit you could make in the long run will depend in your skills, because if you're good, you know when to buy to maximize the profit you can make in the long run, you also know when to sell your Bitcoin holdings. What's gonna matter also is your funds, that is also a big factor when investing in cryptocurrency, the bigger funds you invest, the bigger the profit you could have in the long run if you're not gonna mess up your DCA. It's not complicated, you only need 2 things, money and a reputable bitcoin wallet.

comments.author: Salahmu
comments.body: OP Knowing how much you could make from investing on Bitcoin is not actually certain but however we should remove the mindset of how much is to be made by investing on Bitcoin, I no that every objective or goals of investment is to make a profit but one of things we most no is that Bitcoin investment is not a get rich quick were you invest and expect a huge returns immediately. One of the factors that affect most people is that they are more passion for profits without knowing the ups and downs in the Bitcoin, however if your purpose is to make a certain amount of money within a certain period in Bitcoin I will strongly advice you to think twice because the market is very volatile and the chances of getting a particular amounts within a certain time is not guaranteed, so the best way is to hold for a long time. Just like every other investment, it has to do with patients and the only way to enjoy your Bitcoin investment is by holding it for  long and at last you will no how potential Bitcoin is.
